mutation {
  updateStoryMetadata(
    id: "{{ .story_id }}"
    keywords: ["key1", "key2"]
    name: "mystory"
    teamkatalogenURL: "https://some.url"
    productAreaID: "Mocked-001"
    teamID: "team-001"
  ) {
    id
    name
    owner {
      group
      teamkatalogenURL
    }
    keywords
  }
}

RETURNS

OPTION data.updateStoryMetadata.id=IGNORE

ENDOPTS
{
  "data": {
    "updateStoryMetadata": {
      "name": "mystory",
      "owner": {
        "group": "team@nav.no",
        "teamkatalogenURL": "https://some.url"
      },
      "keywords": [
        "key1",
        "key2"
      ]
    }
  }
}
